Your "find the chords in their natural habitat" advice helped me a lot on learning what i know. can i get some more advice?

12.5.18  3:48 am   I just spent the last 3 hours of my life doing a bill wurtz deep dive and I've never wanted to have a conversation with someone more than I did after finishing reality. It's like you talking through your creative process was a mirror of my consciousness. Idk, that doesn't make sense because I wouldn't ever make anything similar to what you make, but I nearly cried when I got to the last one. Thank you. Please do more podcasts because I want so badly to experience another conversation by proxy. That's not a question. What podcast would you like to do?

      Would you do mine?
